scripts.idev:docs: npm run build && cd apps/docs && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.prepublish:check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.publish:eslint-plugin-guard: npm i && cd packages/eslint-plugin-guard && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:lib: npm i && cd packages/lib && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:sync: npm i && cd packages/sync && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:symbols: npm i && cd packages/symbols && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:ui: npm i && cd packages/ui && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:x: npm i && cd packages/x && npm version patch && npm publis.
